name: Super Trump SRPG
description:
Oh boy, A politically sensitive game made in SRPG Studio! What a treat! Lead Trump and his army of generic anime protagonists and characters from better video games into a battle against Democrats, Illegals, and more! Experience the poorly written story and amazing recolored base assets from SRPG Studio, as you fight back against really pathetic enemies because I have no idea how the hell to balance this! Question your life descisions as you play through each chapter of this horrible game.

Updated occasionally: 1-3 Weeks between updates because I'm a lazy idiot lol
